title: Did a male rapist define him as transferring a woman to a women's prison and assaulting women prisoners?
subtitle: Karen White, former Steven Woods, confessed not only to the ill-treatment of her fellow prisoners in a women's prison in West Yorkshire, but also to rape years ago when she was still known as a male.
author: David Emery
vclaim: A transsexual prisoner, Karen White (formerly Stephen Wood) from West Yorkshire, England, who admitted multiple rapes as a man, assaulted women prisoners sexually after being transferred to a women ' s prison.
